title: Dyer's Record Book, 1812–23
medium:
Medium: leather, paper, cotton
Technique: (samples) block and roller printed  on plain weave foundation
inscribed: On flap of book, "T. Ratcliffe". Other names are included on various pages within the book. See research file.
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Leather bound book containing fabric swatches and recipes for printing various colors. Fabric swatches have been both block and cylinder printed, and many have used resist techniques.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1812–23.
1812–23. Medium: leather, paper, cotton
Technique: (samples) block and roller printed  on plain weave foundation. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1987-46-1.
